home.intro1: extens.io is an open-source governance Node.js ecosystem to make a new kind of realtime web applications build on top of the Sails framework.
home.intro2: Using the extens.io ecosystem means your application requires Sails and you trust extens.io to give you more features, hooks, updates, etc.
home.admin.description: Easily manage users, APIs, modules, data, settings and environments with the admin panel.
